title: I just transferred to OCEANIA server from the NA server (experience sharing)
body:
So I just transferred to Oceania server due to the NA free transfer promotion. I did it to reduce pings, but I have to say I like this server so far. Two things I noticed already though which comes as a surprise
1) People always comment when I use my grey warwick and medieval twitch skin.
2) ranked game appears to be easier (but I could be wrong). My vayne is shopping down the hapless enemy team like cakewalk.

So are grey ww and medieval twitch only available for people like me?  :D I wonder if I can use this opportunity to increase my chance of winning

replies.body:
> People always comment when I use my grey warwick and medieval twitch skin.

They're received through the refer a friend system, which we don't have on OCE. They're less common on OCE than most any other server.

> Ranked game appears to be easier (but I could be wrong). My vayne is shopping down the hapless enemy team like cakewalk.

While some people would disagree, ranks on OCE are lower skill base to reach when compared with other servers. I don't know what it's really like but think of it being like our gold is equivalent to other servers silver, as an example.

Grey WW and Medieval Twitch are Refer a Friend rewards, Refer a Friend system has not existed on OCE and wont until they implement the new Refer a Friend some Rioters were talking about a while ago.

Bunch of people are extremely salty that they didn't RAF people while on NA or EUW.
Enjoy our Draft, Dominion and Twisted Treeline... O wait.

Twisted Treeline is up like half the week.


But if you want it up all the time and Dominion as well, GO OUT AND INCREASE THE SERVER POPULATION!
THIS! I'm sick of Blind pick

Its good to hear you enjoying the OCE servers, its ok at times and bad at other times.
Last week these toxic players were telling me to slit my wrists and stuff, kind of sad. 
Theres more toxic people on OCE then others I believe but overall OCE is a great server.
BTW there are alot of lag spikes.

lol and you need urf ww then I will be impressed until then I look at your skins like this -_- till you show me something better 
but yeah oce "can" have really nice people at times other times you will get rude, mean, nasty and spiteful people but its life no point in whining just mute report and forget about them
